subject: Olympic Games
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Intrawest, the company that will run the ski hills for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver, British Columbia, has completed a $1.7 billion refinancing deal, ending weeks of speculation about its financial well-being.
snippet: Intrawest, the company that will run the ski hills for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver, British Columbia, has completed a $1.7 billion refinancing deal, ending weeks of speculation about its financial well-being.
